hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that there's a 1/201 chance per Rupee that the Zora from the diving minigame tosses a 500 Rupee?^Keep winning and the odds go up!

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that shadows in an #invisible maze# guard #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Bomb Flower Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #0# major items.
